title: Touch the Sun
description: An unforgettable new saga of a proud woman and her people, a story of passion and survival in frontier America... From a shy, innocent girl, Eagle Voice would grow into a woman of strength -- a warrior's woman, bound to a life of danger, struggle, and adventure. Like the roots of a mighty tree, she would help anchor her tribe to its beloved homeland. And like the wings of a bird, her fierce passion for one brave man would set her heart in flight and lead her to a soaring destiny...
author: Beverly Bird
